name: Notify Slack on PR

on:
  pull_request:
    types:
      - opened
      - ready_for_review
      - review_requested

jobs:
  notify-slack:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Send Slack Notification
        uses: rtCamp/action-slack-notify@v2
        env:
          SLACK_WEBHOOK: ${{ secrets.SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL }}
          SLACK_MESSAGE: "ðŸš€ A new PR is waiting for review: <${{ github.event.pull_request.html_url }}|${{ github.event.pull_request.title }}> by ${{ github.event.pull_request.user.login }}"
          SLACK_COLOR: "#36a64f"
